itunes:title: Episode 517 - Campaign Kickoff!
title: Episode 517 - Campaign Kickoff!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Tiffany Hart as we rage with our 2020 Patterson/Hollaway New Hanover County School Board campaign kickoff party live from our new studio where we had a chili cookoff to welcome the community, as well ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Tiffany Hart as we rage with our 2020 Patterson/Hollaway New Hanover County School Board campaign kickoff party live from our new studio where we had a chili cookoff to welcome the community, as well as invite local Drinkin' Bros from the area to be guests live on the show the day after the redistricting verdict.  As usual, things get wild.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Tiffany Hart as we rage with our 2020 Patterson/Hollaway New Hanover County School Board campaign kickoff party live from our new studio where we had a chili cookoff to welcome the community, as well as invite local Drinkin' Bros from the area to be guests live on the show the day after the redistricting verdict.  As usual, things get wild.

content:encoded:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Tiffany Hart as we rage with our 2020 Patterson/Hollaway New Hanover County School Board campaign kickoff party live from our new studio where we had a chili cookoff to welcome the community, as well as invite local Drinkin' Bros from the area to be guests live on the show the day after the redistricting verdict.  As usual, things get wild.
